definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Inner Mongolia autonomous region

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
Inner Mongolia autonomous region, abbr. 內蒙古|内蒙古[Nei4 meng3 gu3], capital Hohhot 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4]

sentences.english: "Yinziwu" is warm in winter and cool in summer, making it a good place for living.
sentences.chinese: 洪江古商城的窨子屋冬暖夏涼，十分適宜居住。

sentences.english: "Ubuntu" is an ancient African word that means "humanity to others".
sentences.chinese: “烏班圖”是古非洲詞語，意思是“與人分享”。

sentences.english: However, that implies that ancient China may loom larger in my mind than it should compared to modern China.
sentences.chinese: 不過這可能意味着我頭腦裏的中國古多於今。

sentences.english: The later is also one of the main headstreams of voices recorded in Qie Yun.
sentences.chinese: 古關中話也是《切韻》所記錄語音的主要源頭之一。

sentences.english: How to define the period of Old English literature?
sentences.chinese: 如何界定古英語文學時期？

sentences.english: Teutonic, based on an old Latin quote, or
sentences.chinese: 它來自條頓語，這一猜測基於一條古拉丁語的引述。

sentences.english: It proves that the Jinshajiang suture zone could not have formed the main suture zone in the Paleo-Tethys domain.
sentences.chinese: 因此，金沙江帶不能作爲古特提斯域的主縫合帶。

sentences.english: And the Ancient Nanfeng Klin is the symbol of fine art.
sentences.chinese: 而南風古竈正是集陶藝之精華的地方。

sentences.english: Aim To obtain the paleosalinity of the ancient Sanmen Lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究古三門湖的鹽度數值。

sentences.english: Goodling no longer works at the department.
sentences.chinese: 古德林現已不在司法部工作。

sentences.english: The changes of Chinese ancient bowl bottom is the epitome of the whole ancient ceramic history.
sentences.chinese: 碗底足的變遷是整個古陶瓷歷史變遷的一個縮影。

sentences.english: O-side focus is also related to the high southerly built during the ancient stove with similar Longyao.
sentences.chinese: 鄰側的高竈也是與南風古竈同年代建成的同類龍窯。

sentences.english: Whatever he did, his love of ancient Chinese characters had never changed.
sentences.chinese: 但無論做什麼工作，他對於古漢字的熱愛未減分毫。

sentences.english: Real Mallorca striker Dani Guiza admits he fancies a move to Roma.
sentences.chinese: 馬洛卡前鋒古伊薩承認他夢想加盟羅馬。

sentences.english: The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animals.
sentences.chinese: 大熊貓是一種殘存的古動物。

sentences.english: and many of the anonymous poets from the old English period that I studied in my graduate school days.
sentences.chinese: 還有許多我在大學裏學過的古英語時期的匿名詩人。

definition: medieval/Middle Ages/Chinese middle antiquity, 3rd to 9th centuries, including Sui and Tang Dynasties/Middle (of a language, e.g. Middle English)/used/second-hand
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
